verses.text: Ix yak'anoch 120 heb' winh gobernador winhaj Darío chi', yic syil junjun makan chonhab' heb' winh t'a yol smacb'en.

Ix yak'anoch oxwanhxo sat yajal winh t'a heb' winh gobernador chi', yic syilan heb' winh yet' stanhwan masanil tastac, yic wach' tz'acan tz'aj yak'chaj k'een tumin syak' heb' winh t'a winh rey chi'. D'a skal heb' winh sat yaj chi' ayoch winhaj Daniel chi'.
Ix checlajel winhaj Daniel chi' t'a skal heb' winh yetyajalil chi', yujto wach'nhej syutej sb'a winh. Yuj chi' ix sna winh rey chi' to tz'och winh sat yajalil t'a yol smacb'en chi'.

Axo juntzanh heb' winh yetyajalil winh chi', ix say modo heb' winh tas tz'aj yemta winh t'a yopisio chi'. Palta te k'anab'ajum winh, max elk'an winh t'a tas sk'ulej, ayoch spensar winh t'a yopisio chi'. Yuj chi' malaj junok tas syal yalank'e heb' winh t'a spatic winh.
Yuj chi' ix ochnhej ijan heb' winh snaani, ix yalan heb' winh: Malaj wal junok tas syal calank'e t'a spatic winh, anhej yuj sk'anab'ajan sDiosal winh, xchi heb' winh.

Yuj chi' ix slajtiej sb'a heb' winh yajal chi', yic b'at yalan heb' winh t'a winhaj Darío chi'. Ayic ix k'och heb' winh t'a yichanh winh, ix yalan heb' winh icha tik: --Mamin rey Darío, ayocab'nhej opisio t'a junelnhej.

Ix ko mol lajtiej ko b'a ko masanil a onh yajal onh tik t'a yol a macb'en tik. Ix ko naani to tzak'elta junok ley yic tz'alchajel t'a skal masanil anima t'a masanil yol a macb'en tik to malaj junok mach sk'anan scolwal sdiosal, ma t'a junocxo yetanimail t'a junok ujal, palta anhej t'ayach syal sb'a mamin rey. Ha mach max k'anab'ajan jun ley chi', tojolnhej syumjicanem b'aj macb'il nok' choj.
Yuj chi', mamin rey, ak' tz'ib'chaj jun ley chi', tzak'anoch a sello t'ay yic wach' malaj mach syal sk'exani. A' ko ley a onh medos yet' persas onh tik, max yal-laj yek'b'ati, xchi heb' winh.
Yuj chi' ix schec winhaj rey Darío chi' tz'ib'chaj jun ley chi', ix yak'anoch winh t'a yopisio.

Axo ix yab'an winhaj Daniel to toxo ix alchajel jun ley chi', ix k'enhej winh t'a yol spat t'a chaanh, ix sjacanxi swentena winh k'elanb'at t'a stojolal Jerusalén. Ix em cuman winh, ix lesalwi winh d'ha Dios, ix yak'an yuj diosal winh t'ay. Oxel slesalwi winh t'a junjun k'u, ichataxon sk'ulej winh.
Axo juntzanh heb' winh chi', ix smolb'ej sb'a heb' winh, ix yilan heb' winh to wan slesalwi winh yet' stewi winh d'ha Dios.

Yuj chi' ix b'at heb' winh t'a winh rey chi'. Ix b'at yalan heb' winh yuj jun ley toxo ix alchajel chi', ix yalan heb' winh icha tik: --Toton ix a chec alchajel jun ley tz'alan icha tik: Yalnhej mach syal sb'ha t'a sdiosal, ma t'a junocxo ch'oc animail t'a junok ujal, tato manhoc t'a winh rey syal tas snib'ej, yowalil syumchajem b'aj macb'il nok' choj, xchi. ¿Manh am yeloc icha chi'? xchi heb' winh. --Ichaton chi' ix aji. Ha jun ley chi' yowalil sk'anab'ajaji, a ko leyal a onh medos yet' persas onh tik, max yal-laj yek'b'at tas syala', xchi winh rey chi'.

Yuj chi' ix ochnhej ijan heb' winh yalan icha tik: --Ha winhaj Daniel, winh ik'chajnaccot t'a Judá, max sk'anab'ajejlaj winh. Mamin rey, manh jab'oc xiv winh t'ayach, malaj pax jab'oc yelk'och jun ley chi' t'a winh. Toxo ix quila' to oxel slesalwi winh t'a sDiosal t'a junjun k'u, xchi heb' winh.
Ayic ix yab'an winh rey chi' icha chi', ix och winh t'a cusk'olal. Masanil jun k'ual chi', ix sayek' winh tas tz'aj scolchajel winhaj Daniel chi'.

Axo yic wanxo sb'at k'u, ix smolb'anxi sb'a juntzanh heb' winh winak chi' t'a yichanh winh rey chi', ix yalan heb' winh: --Mamin rey, ojtac wal to a ko ley a onh medos yet' persas onh tik, ta ay junok lolonel, ma junok ley toxo ix yalel winh rey, maxtzac yal-laj yek'b'ati, xchi heb' winh.

Ixlajwi chi', ix schecan winh rey chi' ik'chajcot winhaj Daniel chi' yic syumchajem winh b'aj macb'il nok' choj chi'. Ayic manto yumchajem winh, ix yalan winh rey chi' t'a winh: --Comonoc wal ol ach coljoc yuj a Diosal to ayachnhejoch ak'an serwil, xchi winh.

Ayic toxo ix yumjicanem winh t'a skal nok' choj chi', ix ak'jicanem jun k'een k'een smaculoc. Ix ak'jicanoch sello yic yopisio winh rey chi' t'a k'een yet' sello heb' winh niwac yajal yaj yet' winh, yic wach' max tenjiek' tas ix alchaj t'a spatic winhaj Daniel chi'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix b'at winh rey chi' t'a spalacio, palta majxo walaj winh, majxo schec winh ik'chajcot heb' tz'ak'an tzalajb'oc sk'ool. Ix b'at way winh, palta junelnhej maj ochlaj swayanh winh t'a jun ak'wal chi'.
Ix pet k'e waan winh, ix b'at lemnaj winh t'a sti' b'aj macb'il nok' choj chi'.

Ayic ix k'och winh t'a slak'anil chi', ix awaj winh t'a winhaj Daniel chi'. Cuseltac ix yutej awaj sb'a winh, ix yalan winh: --Daniel, ach schecab' jun Dios pitzan, aton jun Dios tzak'nhej serwil ¿ix am yal ach scolanel a Diosal t'a nok' choj chi'? xchi winh.
Ix tak'wi winhaj Daniel chi' icha tik: --Mamin rey, ayocab' opisio t'a junelnhej.

Ix scheccot jun yángel in Diosal yic smacan sti' nok' choj tik. Yuj chi' malaj wal jab'oc tas ix in yutej nok', yujto yojtac to malaj jab'oc in mul t'a yichanh. Malaj pax tas chuk ix in k'ulej t'ayach, xchi winh.

Yuj chi' ix te tzalajk'e winh rey chi', ix schecan winh ik'chajk'eta winhaj Daniel b'aj ay nok' choj chi'. Axo yic ix k'eul winh, ix yilan heb' to malaj jab'oc b'aj ix lajwi winh, yujto a sDiosal winh ayoch yipoc sk'ool.

Ixlajwi chi', ix yalan winh rey chi' to sb'at ik'jicot heb' winh ix alank'e jun lolonel t'a spatic winhaj Daniel chi'. Ix yumjicanem heb' winh t'a skal nok' choj chi' yet' yetb'eyum yet' yalyuninal junjun heb' winh. Manto emk'ochlaj heb' t'a skal nok', ix k'eta tzacaljoc nok' t'a heb', chok' ix aj heb' yuj nok'.
Ixlajwi chi', ix yak'an tz'ib'chaj winhaj rey Darío jun tik t'a masanil anima yalnhej tas ti'al ay t'a yol smacb'en chi'. Ix yalanb'at winh icha tik: Junk'olalocab' eyaji.

Swalan t'ayex he masanil t'a yol in macb'en, niwanocab' yelk'och sDiosal winhaj Daniel t'a yol he sat. Yujto a sDiosal winh chi', pitzan toni, aynhejek' t'a junelnhej. Ha yopisio, malaj b'ak'uinh ol sateloc, malaj slajwub'.
Ha Jun Colwajum chi', a scolan heb' yic yet' spoder. Sch'oxan tas satub'tac t'a satcha’anh yet' t'a sat lu'um tik. Ha ix colanel winhaj Daniel t'a nok' choj, xchib'at winh rey chi'.
Aynhejoch winhaj Daniel chi' t'a yopisio ayic ayoch winhaj Darío t'a reyal yet' pax yic ayoch winhaj Ciro aj Persia reyal.
